short_summary: Electoral material acquisition - Envelopes with gussets
description: The information contained in this notice is a brief description of the requirement and is for information purposes only. Bidders must refer to the complete RFP document for a full description of the requirement and the full bid instructions, see notice for details
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### Document ID: PW-22-01004552
### Solicitation Number: ECSF-RFP-22-1533
### Publication Date: August 17, 2022
### Tender Closing Date: September 06, 2022

The Government of Canada's Elections Canada is seeking a tender for the acquisition of goods, specifically Envelopes with Gussets, pursuant to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Background

The procurements are subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA). The Tender is subject to the Trade Agreement regime administered by the Government of Canada.

### Requirement Description

The Contract, including the Statement of Work (SOW), will be for a period of one year, commencing on the date of Contract Award, with an option for further extension for a period of up to two years on a term and condition basis. The Contracting Authority will negotiate with contracted suppliers as per the necessity of the procurement process. All information provided by Elections Canada is given for information purposes only, any and all reference to it should be reviewed against the bid documents.

### Tender Submission Details

Submissions are to be addressed to the attention of the Contracting Authority at:
Elections Canada,
30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Ontario K1A 0M6

### Additional Information

For sending packages by courier, the Proposal Receiving Unit at the Business Centre is open for regular business hours, Mondays to Fridays, from 8am to 4:00pm. Documents to be submitted must be either in English or French.

The Contracting Authority reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on a term-by-term basis as necessary to conform to the requirements of the government procurement process.

**Oct 05, 2022, 08:55 EST}

Window closing: Tuesday, September 6, 2022 - 02:00pm EST
